cause.description:
from page 00001 of Principia Discordia
We are a tribe of philosophers, theologians, magicians, scientists, artists, clowns, and similar maniacs who are intrigued with ERIS THE GODDESS OF CONFUSION and with Her Doings
1. Chaos is a human right
cause.mission: Honor Discordia, or at least try
cause.name: End The Sanity
